Gateway Solution

Our gateways enable fast smart farming out-of-the-box and serve as an intelligent broker between all sensors in the field and the cloud. Sensors can either be connected via a serial interface or communicate via LoRaWAN with the gateway

Cellular

Our gateway enables reliable communication with the cloud via mobile communications

Low power

Energy-efficient communication thanks to LPWAN standard enables a sensor battery life of up to 10 years

NB-IoT

Connects the gateway to the cloud via LTE based communication

Flexibility

The gateway can be placed at any position in the free field

LoRaWAN

Enables energy-efficient communication with sensors over long distances
